Is Bangaloreâ€™s IT Sector Ready for Trumpâ€™s New Tariff World?Over the past few weeks, Trumpâ€™s re-election bid has reignited his tariff-first doctrineâ€”this time with a clearer structure: green, yellow, red buckets for trade partners. India likely sits in the â€œyellowâ€ zoneâ€”strategic, but not untouchable.While the tariffs are primarily aimed at goods, the ripple effect on the U.S. economy and client behaviors will directly impact Indiaâ€™s $280B IT industryâ€”especially in Bangalore, the tech capital of the world.So letâ€™s talk real numbers and ground realities for Bangaloreâ€™s IT ecosystem:â¸»Short-Term Impact (2024-2025): â€¢	Client Anxiety = Project SlowdownsWith inflationary fears rising in the U.S. due to tariffs, clients are delaying discretionary IT spends.â†’ Project closures are down by 1.3% QoQ.â†’ Bench strength has increased by 15% in Tier 1 IT firms. â€¢	Hiring Freeze LightHiring across software services and product-based companies is down by 22% YoY in Bangalore since Jan 2024. Lateral hiring is particularly slow. â€¢	Revenue Dips in BFSI and RetailU.S.-based clients from banking and retailâ€”major verticals for Indian ITâ€”are cutting back budgets by 8â€“10% as per early FY25 trends.â¸»Long-Term Outlook (2025-2030): â€¢	Opportunity in U.S. Re-shoringAs U.S. firms diversify away from China/Vietnam, India can absorb that businessâ€”if it aligns its manufacturing + IT policy.â†’ Expect up to 3 million new tech-manufacturing crossover jobs by 2030. â€¢	New Skilling DemandsDemand for AI, DevOps, Cybersecurity and Cloud Infra experts will surge. Bangalore must build a new tech workforce, not just more headcount. â€¢	Strategic Green Zone?If India navigates diplomacy well, it could move into the â€œgreen bucketâ€ of U.S. tradeâ€”with tariff relief and investment access.â†’ That could unlock $100B+ in bilateral digital infrastructure flows in the next 5 years.â¸»The Big Picture:Yes, Trumpâ€™s tariff chaos looks messy. But behind it is a well-orchestrated global reset. If India positions itself wisely, Bangalore could emerge as the strategic tech capital in a new U.S.-aligned global order.But it will take policy agility, economic diplomacy, and workforce transformationâ€”not business as usual.â¸»Is Bangalore ready for the MAGA global reset? hashtag#BangaloreTech hashtag#TrumpTariffs hashtag#GlobalTrade hashtag#IndianIT hashtag#BangaloreJobs hashtag#DigitalIndia hashtag#TariffImpact hashtag#MakeInIndia hashtag#TechDiplomacy hashtag#GlobalEconomy hashtag#EmergingMarkets hashtag#AIJobs hashtag#USIndiaRelations hashtag#Geopolitics hashtag#SoftwareJobs hashtag#Workforce2025 hashtag#MAGAPlan hashtag#Infrastructure hashtag#JobMarket hashtag#FutureOfWork hashtag#LinkedInNews hashtag#IndiaTechLeadership

â° Mastering CRON Scheduling in Jenkins and CI/CD PipelinesAutomating builds, tests, and deployments efficiently is crucial in modern DevOps workflows. One powerful tool for achieving this is CRON scheduling.In Jenkins (and many other CI/CD tools), CRON lets you define precise schedules for automated tasks using a simple syntax:```* * * * *|  |  |  |  ||  |  |  | +--- Day of the week (0-7) (Sunday=0 or 7)|  |  | +----- Month (1-12)|  | +------- Day of the month (1-31)| +--------- Hour (0-23)+----------- Minute (0-59)```Examples:- Every minute: `* * * * *`- Every day at midnight: `0 0 * * *`- Every Sunday at 3 AM: `0 3 * * 0`Using CRON effectively ensures your CI/CD pipelines run precisely when needed, optimizing resource utilization and keeping your software delivery process smooth and predictable.hashtag#DevOps hashtag#Jenkins hashtag#CICD hashtag#Automation hashtag#CRON hashtag#ContinuousIntegration hashtag#ContinuousDelivery

Navigating the 2025 Job Market: A Challenging Reality for Job Seekers ğŸ’¼ğŸ”The job market in 2025 is more competitive than ever, with tightening hiring processes, automation reshaping industries, and companies focusing on cost-efficiency. For those seeking jobs, this means fewer job postings, evolving skill demands, and an increasing reliance on AI ğŸ¤–. With the U.S. unemployment rate at 4.2% and AI-driven automation affecting 60% of jobs, itâ€™s clear that the struggle is real.Reflecting on my own journey:ğŸ’  I started my job search in August 2024, and it took me almost two weeks just to perfect my resume! Even when I thought I was done, I kept refining it ğŸ“„ğŸ”„.ğŸ’ No one was around to guide me on how to apply for jobs, but Pritesh Jagani 's videos became my lifesaver. I tuned into his several podcasts ğŸ§ to understand how to market myself effectively.ğŸ’ I can't do mass applications. An application almost takes an hour for me, first finding the right job application, then tailoring resume, asking for referral, applying, and then reaching out to recruiters. This way I find that I got better results. It's all about quality over quantity âœ….ğŸ’ Reaching out to over 1000 employees on LinkedIn, I only received responses from 10 to 15 people agreeing to refer ğŸ¤. I've applied to 300+ jobs so far. Received several emails from companies saying that the position has been filled, or has been closed. I gave a few screening rounds, and final rounds too. Every interview resulted in rejection. Disappointing, but every rejection has been a learning experience ğŸ’ª. In parallel, Iâ€™ve been developing my skills, building projects ğŸ› ï¸, and growing my network ğŸŒ. While the road is tough, Iâ€™ve gained valuable insights from this journey. Here are my key takeaways:ğŸ”‘ Just submitting your resume online isnâ€™t enoughâ€”always apply via a referral ğŸ’¡.ğŸ”‘ Reach out to recruiters! Express why youâ€™re a great fit for the role, show your enthusiasm for the company, and demonstrate your research on the organization ğŸ“š.ğŸ”‘ Tap into your alumni network. Finding alumni from your program and requesting a brief virtual chat can unlock hidden job opportunities and expand your connections ğŸ‘¥.With expertise in full-stack development, AI-driven solutions, and cloud technologies, I am proficient in JavaScript, React, Node.js, Express, Python, MongoDB, and DevOps tools such as Jenkins and Docker. ğŸ’»ğŸš€ I am continuously expanding my skill set and am open to new opportunities where I can contribute to innovative projects and further advance my career. ğŸ“ˆ I am currently seeking a position where I can apply my skills and experience. If you have any relevant opportunities, feel free to reach out to meâ€”Iâ€™d be happy to connect and discuss how I can contribute to your team. ğŸ¤hashtag#OpenToWork hashtag#Hiring hashtag#SoftwareEngineer hashtag#FullStackDeveloper hashtag#AI hashtag#JavaScript hashtag#ReactJS hashtag#NodeJS hashtag#Python hashtag#DevOps hashtag#JobSearch hashtag#TechJobs hashtag#SoftwareDevelopment

hashtag#hiring *ADC Engineer II, EC2 with Security Clearance*, Herndon, *United States*, fulltime hashtag#opentowork hashtag#Herndonjobs hashtag#Virginiajobs hashtag#ITCommunications hashtag#entrylevel hashtag#firstjob hashtag#newgrad hashtag#internship hashtag#entryleveljobs *To Apply -->*: https://lnkd.in/g4Fmmq3F DESCRIPTION Would you like to help implement innovative cloud computing solutions and solve the world's most complex technical problems? Do you have a deep passion and desire to engineer and operate the world's largest cloud computing infrastructure to provide a better world for future generations? Amazon Web Services is seeking top industry technical experts to grow our team dedicated to expanding our Elastic Compute Cloud (EC2) to government customers. We are seeking a talented engineer skilled in the art of integration who understands the Agile mindset and DevOps philosophies, yet is not constrained by how "things are usually done" and is willing to decompose and reinvent systems, processes, and tools. We're looking for a technical expert for one of the largest compute services on the planet; if you possess that rare mix of depth in Operations, Networking, and Systems Engineering then we are waiting for your application. This position requires that the candidate selected must currently possess and maintain an active TS/SCI security clearance with polygraph. The position further requires the candidate to opt into a commensurate clearance for each government agency for which they perform AWS work. Key job responsibilitiesYou'll be part of a world-class team in a fast-paced environment that has the entrepreneurial feel of a start-up. This is an opportunity to operate and engineer systems on a massive scale, and to gain top-notch experience in cloud computing. You'll be surrounded by people who are smart, passionate about cloud computing, and believe that world class service is critical to customer success. You'll become expert at EC2 platform diagnosis, response, measurement, and automation. You will design and build the operational scalability that sustains the platform's insane growth. You will be able to measure your success by its visible impact on the efficiency and effectiveness of government services for our nation. A day in the lifeAmazon has a fast-paced environment where we "Work Hard, Have Fun, Make History." On a "typical" day engineers might deep dive to root cause a customer issue, investigate why a metric is trending the wrong way, consult with the top engineers at Amazon, or discuss radical new approaches to automate operational issues. About the teamWhy AWSAmazon Web Services (AWS) is the world's most comprehensive and broadly adopted cloud platform. We pioneered cloud computing and never stopped innovating - that's why customers from the most successful startups to Global 500 companies trust our robust suite of products and services to power their businesses. Is Bangaloreâ€™s IT Sector Ready for Trumpâ€™s New Tariff World?Over the past few weeks, Trumpâ€™s re-election bid has reignited his tariff-first doctrineâ€”this time with a clearer structure: green, yellow, red buckets for trade partners. India likely sits in the â€œyellowâ€ zoneâ€”strategic, but not untouchable.While the tariffs are primarily aimed at goods, the ripple effect on the U.S. economy and client behaviors will directly impact Indiaâ€™s $280B IT industryâ€”especially in Bangalore, the tech capital of the world.So letâ€™s talk real numbers and ground realities for Bangaloreâ€™s IT ecosystem:â¸»Short-Term Impact (2024-2025): â€¢	Client Anxiety = Project SlowdownsWith inflationary fears rising in the U.S. due to tariffs, clients are delaying discretionary IT spends.â†’ Project closures are down by 1.3% QoQ.â†’ Bench strength has increased by 15% in Tier 1 IT firms. â€¢	Hiring Freeze LightHiring across software services and product-based companies is down by 22% YoY in Bangalore since Jan 2024. Lateral hiring is particularly slow. â€¢	Revenue Dips in BFSI and RetailU.S.-based clients from banking and retailâ€”major verticals for Indian ITâ€”are cutting back budgets by 8â€“10% as per early FY25 trends.â¸»Long-Term Outlook (2025-2030): â€¢	Opportunity in U.S. Re-shoringAs U.S. firms diversify away from China/Vietnam, India can absorb that businessâ€”if it aligns its manufacturing + IT policy.â†’ Expect up to 3 million new tech-manufacturing crossover jobs by 2030. â€¢	New Skilling DemandsDemand for AI, DevOps, Cybersecurity and Cloud Infra experts will surge. Bangalore must build a new tech workforce, not just more headcount. â€¢	Strategic Green Zone?If India navigates diplomacy well, it could move into the â€œgreen bucketâ€ of U.S. tradeâ€”with tariff relief and investment access.â†’ That could unlock $100B+ in bilateral digital infrastructure flows in the next 5 years.â¸»The Big Picture:Yes, Trumpâ€™s tariff chaos looks messy. But behind it is a well-orchestrated global reset. If India positions itself wisely, Bangalore could emerge as the strategic tech capital in a new U.S.-aligned global order.But it will take policy agility, economic diplomacy, and workforce transformationâ€”not business as usual.â¸»Is Bangalore ready for the MAGA global reset? hashtag#BangaloreTech hashtag#TrumpTariffs hashtag#GlobalTrade hashtag#IndianIT hashtag#BangaloreJobs hashtag#DigitalIndia hashtag#TariffImpact hashtag#MakeInIndia hashtag#TechDiplomacy hashtag#GlobalEconomy hashtag#EmergingMarkets hashtag#AIJobs hashtag#USIndiaRelations hashtag#Geopolitics hashtag#SoftwareJobs hashtag#Workforce2025 hashtag#MAGAPlan hashtag#Infrastructure hashtag#JobMarket hashtag#FutureOfWork hashtag#LinkedInNews hashtag#IndiaTechLeadership

â° Mastering CRON Scheduling in Jenkins and CI/CD PipelinesAutomating builds, tests, and deployments efficiently is crucial in modern DevOps workflows. One powerful tool for achieving this is CRON scheduling.In Jenkins (and many other CI/CD tools), CRON lets you define precise schedules for automated tasks using a simple syntax:```* * * * *|  |  |  |  ||  |  |  | +--- Day of the week (0-7) (Sunday=0 or 7)|  |  | +----- Month (1-12)|  | +------- Day of the month (1-31)| +--------- Hour (0-23)+----------- Minute (0-59)```Examples:- Every minute: `* * * * *`- Every day at midnight: `0 0 * * *`- Every Sunday at 3 AM: `0 3 * * 0`Using CRON effectively ensures your CI/CD pipelines run precisely when needed, optimizing resource utilization and keeping your software delivery process smooth and predictable.hashtag#DevOps hashtag#Jenkins hashtag#CICD hashtag#Automation hashtag#CRON hashtag#ContinuousIntegration hashtag#ContinuousDelivery

Navigating the 2025 Job Market: A Challenging Reality for Job Seekers ğŸ’¼ğŸ”The job market in 2025 is more competitive than ever, with tightening hiring processes, automation reshaping industries, and companies focusing on cost-efficiency. For those seeking jobs, this means fewer job postings, evolving skill demands, and an increasing reliance on AI ğŸ¤–. With the U.S. unemployment rate at 4.2% and AI-driven automation affecting 60% of jobs, itâ€™s clear that the struggle is real.Reflecting on my own journey:ğŸ’  I started my job search in August 2024, and it took me almost two weeks just to perfect my resume! Even when I thought I was done, I kept refining it ğŸ“„ğŸ”„.ğŸ’ No one was around to guide me on how to apply for jobs, but Pritesh Jagani 's videos became my lifesaver. I tuned into his several podcasts ğŸ§ to understand how to market myself effectively.ğŸ’ I can't do mass applications. An application almost takes an hour for me, first finding the right job application, then tailoring resume, asking for referral, applying, and then reaching out to recruiters. This way I find that I got better results. It's all about quality over quantity âœ….ğŸ’ Reaching out to over 1000 employees on LinkedIn, I only received responses from 10 to 15 people agreeing to refer ğŸ¤. I've applied to 300+ jobs so far. Received several emails from companies saying that the position has been filled, or has been closed. I gave a few screening rounds, and final rounds too. Every interview resulted in rejection. Disappointing, but every rejection has been a learning experience ğŸ’ª. In parallel, Iâ€™ve been developing my skills, building projects ğŸ› ï¸, and growing my network ğŸŒ. While the road is tough, Iâ€™ve gained valuable insights from this journey. Here are my key takeaways:ğŸ”‘ Just submitting your resume online isnâ€™t enoughâ€”always apply via a referral ğŸ’¡.ğŸ”‘ Reach out to recruiters! Express why youâ€™re a great fit for the role, show your enthusiasm for the company, and demonstrate your research on the organization ğŸ“š.ğŸ”‘ Tap into your alumni network. Finding alumni from your program and requesting a brief virtual chat can unlock hidden job opportunities and expand your connections ğŸ‘¥.With expertise in full-stack development, AI-driven solutions, and cloud technologies, I am proficient in JavaScript, React, Node.js, Express, Python, MongoDB, and DevOps tools such as Jenkins and Docker. ğŸ’»ğŸš€ I am continuously expanding my skill set and am open to new opportunities where I can contribute to innovative projects and further advance my career. ğŸ“ˆ I am currently seeking a position where I can apply my skills and experience. If you have any relevant opportunities, feel free to reach out to meâ€”Iâ€™d be happy to connect and discuss how I can contribute to your team. ğŸ¤hashtag#OpenToWork hashtag#Hiring hashtag#SoftwareEngineer hashtag#FullStackDeveloper hashtag#AI hashtag#JavaScript hashtag#ReactJS hashtag#NodeJS hashtag#Python hashtag#DevOps hashtag#JobSearch hashtag#TechJobs hashtag#SoftwareDevelopment

hashtag#hiring *ADC Engineer II, EC2 with Security Clearance*, Herndon, *United States*, fulltime hashtag#opentowork hashtag#Herndonjobs hashtag#Virginiajobs hashtag#ITCommunications hashtag#entrylevel hashtag#firstjob hashtag#newgrad hashtag#internship hashtag#entryleveljobs *To Apply -->*: https://lnkd.in/g4Fmmq3F DESCRIPTION Would you like to help implement innovative cloud computing solutions and solve the world's most complex technical problems? Do you have a deep passion and desire to engineer and operate the world's largest cloud computing infrastructure to provide a better world for future generations? Amazon Web Services is seeking top industry technical experts to grow our team dedicated to expanding our Elastic Compute Cloud (EC2) to government customers. We are seeking a talented engineer skilled in the art of integration who understands the Agile mindset and DevOps philosophies, yet is not constrained by how "things are usually done" and is willing to decompose and reinvent systems, processes, and tools. We're looking for a technical expert for one of the largest compute services on the planet; if you possess that rare mix of depth in Operations, Networking, and Systems Engineering then we are waiting for your application. This position requires that the candidate selected must currently possess and maintain an active TS/SCI security clearance with polygraph. The position further requires the candidate to opt into a commensurate clearance for each government agency for which they perform AWS work. Key job responsibilitiesYou'll be part of a world-class team in a fast-paced environment that has the entrepreneurial feel of a start-up. This is an opportunity to operate and engineer systems on a massive scale, and to gain top-notch experience in cloud computing. You'll be surrounded by people who are smart, passionate about cloud computing, and believe that world class service is critical to customer success. You'll become expert at EC2 platform diagnosis, response, measurement, and automation. You will design and build the operational scalability that sustains the platform's insane growth. You will be able to measure your success by its visible impact on the efficiency and effectiveness of government services for our nation. A day in the lifeAmazon has a fast-paced environment where we "Work Hard, Have Fun, Make History." On a "typical" day engineers might deep dive to root cause a customer issue, investigate why a metric is trending the wrong way, consult with the top engineers at Amazon, or discuss radical new approaches to automate operational issues. About the teamWhy AWSAmazon Web Services (AWS) is the world's most comprehensive and broadly adopted cloud platform. We pioneered cloud computing and never stopped innovating - that's why customers from the most successful startups to Global 500 companies trust our robust suite of products and services to power their businesses. Is Bangaloreâ€™s IT Sector Ready for Trumpâ€™s New Tariff World?Over the past few weeks, Trumpâ€™s re-election bid has reignited his tariff-first doctrineâ€”this time with a clearer structure: green, yellow, red buckets for trade partners. India likely sits in the â€œyellowâ€ zoneâ€”strategic, but not untouchable.While the tariffs are primarily aimed at goods, the ripple effect on the U.S. economy and client behaviors will directly impact Indiaâ€™s $280B IT industryâ€”especially in Bangalore, the tech capital of the world.So letâ€™s talk real numbers and ground realities for Bangaloreâ€™s IT ecosystem:â¸»Short-Term Impact (2024-2025): â€¢	Client Anxiety = Project SlowdownsWith inflationary fears rising in the U.S. due to tariffs, clients are delaying discretionary IT spends.â†’ Project closures are down by 1.3% QoQ.â†’ Bench strength has increased by 15% in Tier 1 IT firms. â€¢	Hiring Freeze LightHiring across software services and product-based companies is down by 22% YoY in Bangalore since Jan 2024. Lateral hiring is particularly slow. â€¢	Revenue Dips in BFSI and RetailU.S.-based clients from banking and retailâ€”major verticals for Indian ITâ€”are cutting back budgets by 8â€“10% as per early FY25 trends.â¸»Long-Term Outlook (2025-2030): â€¢	Opportunity in U.S. Re-shoringAs U.S. firms diversify away from China/Vietnam, India can absorb that businessâ€”if it aligns its manufacturing + IT policy.â†’ Expect up to 3 million new tech-manufacturing crossover jobs by 2030. â€¢	New Skilling DemandsDemand for AI, DevOps, Cybersecurity and Cloud Infra experts will surge. Bangalore must build a new tech workforce, not just more headcount. â€¢	Strategic Green Zone?If India navigates diplomacy well, it could move into the â€œgreen bucketâ€ of U.S. tradeâ€”with tariff relief and investment access.â†’ That could unlock $100B+ in bilateral digital infrastructure flows in the next 5 years.â¸»The Big Picture:Yes, Trumpâ€™s tariff chaos looks messy. â° Mastering CRON Scheduling in Jenkins and CI/CD PipelinesAutomating builds, tests, and deployments efficiently is crucial in modern DevOps workflows. One powerful tool for achieving this is CRON scheduling.In Jenkins (and many other CI/CD tools), CRON lets you define precise schedules for automated tasks using a simple syntax:```* * * * *|  |  |  |  ||  |  |  | +--- Day of the week (0-7) (Sunday=0 or 7)|  |  | +----- Month (1-12)|  | +------- Day of the month (1-31)| +--------- Hour (0-23)+----------- Minute (0-59)```Examples:- Every minute: `* * * * *`- Every day at midnight: `0 0 * * *`- Every Sunday at 3 AM: `0 3 * * 0`Using CRON effectively ensures your CI/CD pipelines run precisely when needed, optimizing resource utilization and keeping your software delivery process smooth and predictable.hashtag#DevOps hashtag#Jenkins hashtag#CICD hashtag#Automation hashtag#CRON hashtag#ContinuousIntegration hashtag#ContinuousDelivery

Navigating the 2025 Job Market: A Challenging Reality for Job Seekers ğŸ’¼ğŸ”The job market in 2025 is more competitive than ever, with tightening hiring processes, automation reshaping industries, and companies focusing on cost-efficiency. For those seeking jobs, this means fewer job postings, evolving skill demands, and an increasing reliance on AI ğŸ¤–. With the U.S. unemployment rate at 4.2% and AI-driven automation affecting 60% of jobs, itâ€™s clear that the struggle is real.Reflecting on my own journey:ğŸ’  I started my job search in August 2024, and it took me almost two weeks just to perfect my resume! Even when I thought I was done, I kept refining it ğŸ“„ğŸ”„.ğŸ’ No one was around to guide me on how to apply for jobs, but Pritesh Jagani 's videos became my lifesaver. I tuned into his several podcasts ğŸ§ to understand how to market myself effectively.ğŸ’ I can't do mass applications. An application almost takes an hour for me, first finding the right job application, then tailoring resume, asking for referral, applying, and then reaching out to recruiters. This way I find that I got better results. It's all about quality over quantity âœ….ğŸ’ Reaching out to over 1000 employees on LinkedIn, I only received responses from 10 to 15 people agreeing to refer ğŸ¤. I've applied to 300+ jobs so far. Received several emails from companies saying that the position has been filled, or has been closed. I gave a few screening rounds, and final rounds too. Every interview resulted in rejection. Disappointing, but every rejection has been a learning experience ğŸ’ª. In parallel, Iâ€™ve been developing my skills, building projects ğŸ› ï¸, and growing my network ğŸŒ. While the road is tough, Iâ€™ve gained valuable insights from this journey. Here are my key takeaways:ğŸ”‘ Just submitting your resume online isnâ€™t enoughâ€”always apply via a referral ğŸ’¡.ğŸ”‘ Reach out to recruiters! Express why youâ€™re a great fit for the role, show your enthusiasm for the company, and demonstrate your research on the organization ğŸ“š.ğŸ”‘ Tap into your alumni network. Finding alumni from your program and requesting a brief virtual chat can unlock hidden job opportunities and expand your connections ğŸ‘¥.With expertise in full-stack development, AI-driven solutions, and cloud technologies, I am proficient in JavaScript, React, Node.js, Express, Python, MongoDB, and DevOps tools such as Jenkins and Docker. ğŸ’»ğŸš€ I am continuously expanding my skill set and am open to new opportunities where I can contribute to innovative projects and further advance my career. ğŸ“ˆ I am currently seeking a position where I can apply my skills and experience. If you have any relevant opportunities, feel free to reach out to meâ€”Iâ€™d be happy to connect and discuss how I can contribute to your team. ğŸ¤hashtag#OpenToWork hashtag#Hiring hashtag#SoftwareEngineer hashtag#FullStackDeveloper hashtag#AI hashtag#JavaScript hashtag#ReactJS hashtag#NodeJS hashtag#Python hashtag#DevOps hashtag#JobSearch hashtag#TechJobs hashtag#SoftwareDevelopment

hashtag#hiring *ADC Engineer II, EC2 with Security Clearance*, Herndon, *United States*, fulltime hashtag#opentowork hashtag#Herndonjobs hashtag#Virginiajobs hashtag#ITCommunications hashtag#entrylevel hashtag#firstjob hashtag#newgrad hashtag#internship hashtag#entryleveljobs *To Apply -->*: https://lnkd.in/g4Fmmq3F DESCRIPTION Would you like to help implement innovative cloud computing solutions and solve the world's most complex technical problems? Do you have a deep passion and desire to engineer and operate the world's largest cloud computing infrastructure to provide a better world for future generations? Amazon Web Services is seeking top industry technical experts to grow our team dedicated to expanding our Elastic Compute Cloud (EC2) to government customers. We are seeking a talented engineer skilled in the art of integration who understands the Agile mindset and DevOps philosophies, yet is not constrained by how "things are usually done" and is willing to decompose and reinvent systems, processes, and tools. We're looking for a technical expert for one of the largest compute services on the planet; if you possess that rare mix of depth in Operations, Networking, and Systems Engineering then we are waiting for your application. This position requires that the candidate selected must currently possess and maintain an active TS/SCI security clearance with polygraph. The position further requires the candidate to opt into a commensurate clearance for each government agency for which they perform AWS work. Key job responsibilitiesYou'll be part of a world-class team in a fast-paced environment that has the entrepreneurial feel of a start-up. This is an opportunity to operate and engineer systems on a massive scale, and to gain top-notch experience in cloud computing. You'll be surrounded by people who are smart, passionate about cloud computing, and believe that world class service is critical to customer success. You'll become expert at EC2 platform diagnosis, response, measurement, and automation. You will design and build the operational scalability that sustains the platform's insane growth. You will be able to measure your success by its visible impact on the efficiency and effectiveness of government services for our nation. A day in the lifeAmazon has a fast-paced environment where we "Work Hard, Have Fun, Make History." On a "typical" day engineers might deep dive to root cause a customer issue, investigate why a metric is trending the wrong way, consult with the top engineers at Amazon, or discuss radical new approaches to automate operational issues. About the teamWhy AWSAmazon Web Services (AWS) is the world's most comprehensive and broadly adopted cloud platform. We pioneered cloud computing and never stopped innovating - that's why customers from the most successful startups to Global 500 companies trust our robust suite of products and services to power their businesses. â° Mastering CRON Scheduling in Jenkins and CI/CD PipelinesAutomating builds, tests, and deployments efficiently is crucial in modern DevOps workflows. One powerful tool for achieving this is CRON scheduling.In Jenkins (and many other CI/CD tools), CRON lets you define precise schedules for automated tasks using a simple syntax:```* * * * *|  |  |  |  ||  |  |  | +--- Day of the week (0-7) (Sunday=0 or 7)|  |  | +----- Month (1-12)|  | +------- Day of the month (1-31)| +--------- Hour (0-23)+----------- Minute (0-59)```Examples:- Every minute: `* * * * *`- Every day at midnight: `0 0 * * *`- Every Sunday at 3 AM: `0 3 * * 0`Using CRON effectively ensures your CI/CD pipelines run precisely when needed, optimizing resource utilization and keeping your software delivery process smooth and predictable.hashtag#DevOps hashtag#Jenkins hashtag#CICD hashtag#Automation hashtag#CRON hashtag#ContinuousIntegration hashtag#ContinuousDelivery

hashtag#hiring *ADC Engineer II, EC2 with Security Clearance*, Herndon, *United States*, fulltime hashtag#opentowork hashtag#Herndonjobs hashtag#Virginiajobs hashtag#ITCommunications hashtag#entrylevel hashtag#firstjob hashtag#newgrad hashtag#internship hashtag#entryleveljobs *To Apply -->*: https://lnkd.in/g4Fmmq3F DESCRIPTION Would you like to help implement innovative cloud computing solutions and solve the world's most complex technical problems? Do you have a deep passion and desire to engineer and operate the world's largest cloud computing infrastructure to provide a better world for future generations? Amazon Web Services is seeking top industry technical experts to grow our team dedicated to expanding our Elastic Compute Cloud (EC2) to government customers. We are seeking a talented engineer skilled in the art of integration who understands the Agile mindset and DevOps philosophies, yet is not constrained by how "things are usually done" and is willing to decompose and reinvent systems, processes, and tools. We're looking for a technical expert for one of the largest compute services on the planet; if you possess that rare mix of depth in Operations, Networking, and Systems Engineering then we are waiting for your application. This position requires that the candidate selected must currently possess and maintain an active TS/SCI security clearance with polygraph. The position further requires the candidate to opt into a commensurate clearance for each government agency for which they perform AWS work. Key job responsibilitiesYou'll be part of a world-class team in a fast-paced environment that has the entrepreneurial feel of a start-up. This is an opportunity to operate and engineer systems on a massive scale, and to gain top-notch experience in cloud computing. You'll be surrounded by people who are smart, passionate about cloud computing, and believe that world class service is critical to customer success. You'll become expert at EC2 platform diagnosis, response, measurement, and automation. You will design and build the operational scalability that sustains the platform's insane growth. You will be able to measure your success by its visible impact on the efficiency and effectiveness of government services for our nation. A day in the lifeAmazon has a fast-paced environment where we "Work Hard, Have Fun, Make History." On a "typical" day engineers might deep dive to root cause a customer issue, investigate why a metric is trending the wrong way, consult with the top engineers at Amazon, or discuss radical new approaches to automate operational issues. About the teamWhy AWSAmazon Web Services (AWS) is the world's most comprehensive and broadly adopted cloud platform. We pioneered cloud computing and never stopped innovating - that's why customers from the most successful startups to Global 500 companies trust our robust suite of products and services to power their businesses. â° Mastering CRON Scheduling in Jenkins and CI/CD PipelinesAutomating builds, tests, and deployments efficiently is crucial in modern DevOps workflows. One powerful tool for achieving this is CRON scheduling.In Jenkins (and many other CI/CD tools), CRON lets you define precise schedules for automated tasks using a simple syntax:```* * * * *|  |  |  |  ||  |  |  | +--- Day of the week (0-7) (Sunday=0 or 7)|  |  | +----- Month (1-12)|  | +------- Day of the month (1-31)| +--------- Hour (0-23)+----------- Minute (0-59)```Examples:- Every minute: `* * * * *`- Every day at midnight: `0 0 * * *`- Every Sunday at 3 AM: `0 3 * * 0`Using CRON effectively ensures your CI/CD pipelines run precisely when needed, optimizing resource utilization and keeping your software delivery process smooth and predictable.hashtag#DevOps hashtag#Jenkins hashtag#CICD hashtag#Automation hashtag#CRON hashtag#ContinuousIntegration hashtag#ContinuousDelivery

Navigating the 2025 Job Market: A Challenging Reality for Job Seekers ğŸ’¼ğŸ”The job market in 2025 is more competitive than ever, with tightening hiring processes, automation reshaping industries, and companies focusing on cost-efficiency. For those seeking jobs, this means fewer job postings, evolving skill demands, and an increasing reliance on AI ğŸ¤–. With the U.S. unemployment rate at 4.2% and AI-driven automation affecting 60% of jobs, itâ€™s clear that the struggle is real.Reflecting on my own journey:ğŸ’  I started my job search in August 2024, and it took me almost two weeks just to perfect my resume! Even when I thought I was done, I kept refining it ğŸ“„ğŸ”„.ğŸ’ No one was around to guide me on how to apply for jobs, but Pritesh Jagani 's videos became my lifesaver. I tuned into his several podcasts ğŸ§ to understand how to market myself effectively.ğŸ’ I can't do mass applications. An application almost takes an hour for me, first finding the right job application, then tailoring resume, asking for referral, applying, and then reaching out to recruiters. This way I find that I got better results. It's all about quality over quantity âœ….ğŸ’ Reaching out to over 1000 employees on LinkedIn, I only received responses from 10 to 15 people agreeing to refer ğŸ¤. I've applied to 300+ jobs so far. Received several emails from companies saying that the position has been filled, or has been closed. I gave a few screening rounds, and final rounds too. Every interview resulted in rejection. Disappointing, but every rejection has been a learning experience ğŸ’ª. In parallel, Iâ€™ve been developing my skills, building projects ğŸ› ï¸, and growing my network ğŸŒ. While the road is tough, Iâ€™ve gained valuable insights from this journey. Here are my key takeaways:ğŸ”‘ Just submitting your resume online isnâ€™t enoughâ€”always apply via a referral ğŸ’¡.ğŸ”‘ Reach out to recruiters! Express why youâ€™re a great fit for the role, show your enthusiasm for the company, and demonstrate your research on the organization ğŸ“š.ğŸ”‘ Tap into your alumni network. Finding alumni from your program and requesting a brief virtual chat can unlock hidden job opportunities and expand your connections ğŸ‘¥.With expertise in full-stack development, AI-driven solutions, and cloud technologies, I am proficient in JavaScript, React, Node.js, Express, Python, MongoDB, and DevOps tools such as Jenkins and Docker. ğŸ’»ğŸš€ I am continuously expanding my skill set and am open to new opportunities where I can contribute to innovative projects and further advance my career. ğŸ“ˆ I am currently seeking a position where I can apply my skills and experience. If you have any relevant opportunities, feel free to reach out to meâ€”Iâ€™d be happy to connect and discuss how I can contribute to your team. ğŸ¤hashtag#OpenToWork hashtag#Hiring hashtag#SoftwareEngineer hashtag#FullStackDeveloper hashtag#AI hashtag#JavaScript hashtag#ReactJS hashtag#NodeJS hashtag#Python hashtag#DevOps hashtag#JobSearch hashtag#TechJobs hashtag#SoftwareDevelopment

hashtag#hiring *ADC Engineer II, EC2 with Security Clearance*, Herndon, *United States*, fulltime hashtag#opentowork hashtag#Herndonjobs hashtag#Virginiajobs hashtag#ITCommunications hashtag#entrylevel hashtag#firstjob hashtag#newgrad hashtag#internship hashtag#entryleveljobs *To Apply -->*: https://lnkd.in/g4Fmmq3F DESCRIPTION Would you like to help implement innovative cloud computing solutions and solve the world's most complex technical problems? Do you have a deep passion and desire to engineer and operate the world's largest cloud computing infrastructure to provide a better world for future generations? Amazon Web Services is seeking top industry technical experts to grow our team dedicated to expanding our Elastic Compute Cloud (EC2) to government customers. We are seeking a talented engineer skilled in the art of integration who understands the Agile mindset and DevOps philosophies, yet is not constrained by how "things are usually done" and is willing to decompose and reinvent systems, processes, and tools. We're looking for a technical expert for one of the largest compute services on the planet; if you possess that rare mix of depth in Operations, Networking, and Systems Engineering then we are waiting for your application. This position requires that the candidate selected must currently possess and maintain an active TS/SCI security clearance with polygraph. The position further requires the candidate to opt into a commensurate clearance for each government agency for which they perform AWS work. Key job responsibilitiesYou'll be part of a world-class team in a fast-paced environment that has the entrepreneurial feel of a start-up. This is an opportunity to operate and engineer systems on a massive scale, and to gain top-notch experience in cloud computing. You'll be surrounded by people who are smart, passionate about cloud computing, and believe that world class service is critical to customer success. You'll become expert at EC2 platform diagnosis, response, measurement, and automation. You will design and build the operational scalability that sustains the platform's insane growth. You will be able to measure your success by its visible impact on the efficiency and effectiveness of government services for our nation. A day in the lifeAmazon has a fast-paced environment where we "Work Hard, Have Fun, Make History." On a "typical" day engineers might deep dive to root cause a customer issue, investigate why a metric is trending the wrong way, consult with the top engineers at Amazon, or discuss radical new approaches to automate operational issues. About the teamWhy AWSAmazon Web Services (AWS) is the world's most comprehensive and broadly adopted cloud platform. We pioneered cloud computing and never stopped innovating - that's why customers from the most successful startups to Global 500 companies trust our robust suite of products and services to power their businesses. Is Bangaloreâ€™s IT Sector Ready for Trumpâ€™s New Tariff World?Over the past few weeks, Trumpâ€™s re-election bid has reignited his tariff-first doctrineâ€”this time with a clearer structure: green, yellow, red buckets for trade partners. India likely sits in the â€œyellowâ€ zoneâ€”strategic, but not untouchable.While the tariffs are primarily aimed at goods, the ripple effect on the U.S. economy and client behaviors will directly impact Indiaâ€™s $280B IT industryâ€”especially in Bangalore, the tech capital of the world.So letâ€™s talk real numbers and ground realities for Bangaloreâ€™s IT ecosystem:â¸»Short-Term Impact (2024-2025): â€¢	Client Anxiety = Project SlowdownsWith inflationary fears rising in the U.S. due to tariffs, clients are delaying discretionary IT spends.â†’ Project closures are down by 1.3% QoQ.â†’ Bench strength has increased by 15% in Tier 1 IT firms. â€¢	Hiring Freeze LightHiring across software services and product-based companies is down by 22% YoY in Bangalore since Jan 2024. Lateral hiring is particularly slow. â€¢	Revenue Dips in BFSI and RetailU.S.-based clients from banking and retailâ€”major verticals for Indian ITâ€”are cutting back budgets by 8â€“10% as per early FY25 trends.â¸»Long-Term Outlook (2025-2030): â€¢	Opportunity in U.S. Re-shoringAs U.S. firms diversify away from China/Vietnam, India can absorb that businessâ€”if it aligns its manufacturing + IT policy.â†’ Expect up to 3 million new tech-manufacturing crossover jobs by 2030. â€¢	New Skilling DemandsDemand for AI, DevOps, Cybersecurity and Cloud Infra experts will surge. Bangalore must build a new tech workforce, not just more headcount. â€¢	Strategic Green Zone?If India navigates diplomacy well, it could move into the â€œgreen bucketâ€ of U.S. tradeâ€”with tariff relief and investment access.â†’ That could unlock $100B+ in bilateral digital infrastructure flows in the next 5 years.â¸»The Big Picture:Yes, Trumpâ€™s tariff chaos looks messy. â° Mastering CRON Scheduling in Jenkins and CI/CD PipelinesAutomating builds, tests, and deployments efficiently is crucial in modern DevOps workflows. One powerful tool for achieving this is CRON scheduling.In Jenkins (and many other CI/CD tools), CRON lets you define precise schedules for automated tasks using a simple syntax:```* * * * *|  |  |  |  ||  |  |  | +--- Day of the week (0-7) (Sunday=0 or 7)|  |  | +----- Month (1-12)|  | +------- Day of the month (1-31)| +--------- Hour (0-23)+----------- Minute (0-59)```Examples:- Every minute: `* * * * *`- Every day at midnight: `0 0 * * *`- Every Sunday at 3 AM: `0 3 * * 0`Using CRON effectively ensures your CI/CD pipelines run precisely when needed, optimizing resource utilization and keeping your software delivery process smooth and predictable.hashtag#DevOps hashtag#Jenkins hashtag#CICD hashtag#Automation hashtag#CRON hashtag#ContinuousIntegration hashtag#ContinuousDelivery

Navigating the 2025 Job Market: A Challenging Reality for Job Seekers ğŸ’¼ğŸ”The job market in 2025 is more competitive than ever, with tightening hiring processes, automation reshaping industries, and companies focusing on cost-efficiency. For those seeking jobs, this means fewer job postings, evolving skill demands, and an increasing reliance on AI ğŸ¤–. With the U.S. unemployment rate at 4.2% and AI-driven automation affecting 60% of jobs, itâ€™s clear that the struggle is real.Reflecting on my own journey:ğŸ’  I started my job search in August 2024, and it took me almost two weeks just to perfect my resume! Even when I thought I was done, I kept refining it ğŸ“„ğŸ”„.ğŸ’ No one was around to guide me on how to apply for jobs, but Pritesh Jagani 's videos became my lifesaver. I tuned into his several podcasts ğŸ§ to understand how to market myself effectively.ğŸ’ I can't do mass applications. An application almost takes an hour for me, first finding the right job application, then tailoring resume, asking for referral, applying, and then reaching out to recruiters. This way I find that I got better results. It's all about quality over quantity âœ….ğŸ’ Reaching out to over 1000 employees on LinkedIn, I only received responses from 10 to 15 people agreeing to refer ğŸ¤. I've applied to 300+ jobs so far. Received several emails from companies saying that the position has been filled, or has been closed. I gave a few screening rounds, and final rounds too. Every interview resulted in rejection. Disappointing, but every rejection has been a learning experience ğŸ’ª. In parallel, Iâ€™ve been developing my skills, building projects ğŸ› ï¸, and growing my network ğŸŒ. While the road is tough, Iâ€™ve gained valuable insights from this journey. Here are my key takeaways:ğŸ”‘ Just submitting your resume online isnâ€™t enoughâ€”always apply via a referral ğŸ’¡.ğŸ”‘ Reach out to recruiters! Express why youâ€™re a great fit for the role, show your enthusiasm for the company, and demonstrate your research on the organization ğŸ“š.ğŸ”‘ Tap into your alumni network. Finding alumni from your program and requesting a brief virtual chat can unlock hidden job opportunities and expand your connections ğŸ‘¥.With expertise in full-stack development, AI-driven solutions, and cloud technologies, I am proficient in JavaScript, React, Node.js, Express, Python, MongoDB, and DevOps tools such as Jenkins and Docker. ğŸ’»ğŸš€ I am continuously expanding my skill set and am open to new opportunities where I can contribute to innovative projects and further advance my career. ğŸ“ˆ I am currently seeking a position where I can apply my skills and experience. If you have any relevant opportunities, feel free to reach out to meâ€”Iâ€™d be happy to connect and discuss how I can contribute to your team. ğŸ¤hashtag#OpenToWork hashtag#Hiring hashtag#SoftwareEngineer hashtag#FullStackDeveloper hashtag#AI hashtag#JavaScript hashtag#ReactJS hashtag#NodeJS hashtag#Python hashtag#DevOps hashtag#JobSearch hashtag#TechJobs hashtag#SoftwareDevelopment

hashtag#hiring *ADC Engineer II, EC2 with Security Clearance*, Herndon, *United States*, fulltime hashtag#opentowork hashtag#Herndonjobs hashtag#Virginiajobs hashtag#ITCommunications hashtag#entrylevel hashtag#firstjob hashtag#newgrad hashtag#internship hashtag#entryleveljobs *To Apply -->*: https://lnkd.in/g4Fmmq3F DESCRIPTION Would you like to help implement innovative cloud computing solutions and solve the world's most complex technical problems? Do you have a deep passion and desire to engineer and operate the world's largest cloud computing infrastructure to provide a better world for future generations? Amazon Web Services is seeking top industry technical experts to grow our team dedicated to expanding our Elastic Compute Cloud (EC2) to government customers. We are seeking a talented engineer skilled in the art of integration who understands the Agile mindset and DevOps philosophies, yet is not constrained by how "things are usually done" and is willing to decompose and reinvent systems, processes, and tools. We're looking for a technical expert for one of the largest compute services on the planet; if you possess that rare mix of depth in Operations, Networking, and Systems Engineering then we are waiting for your application. This position requires that the candidate selected must currently possess and maintain an active TS/SCI security clearance with polygraph. The position further requires the candidate to opt into a commensurate clearance for each government agency for which they perform AWS work. Key job responsibilitiesYou'll be part of a world-class team in a fast-paced environment that has the entrepreneurial feel of a start-up. This is an opportunity to operate and engineer systems on a massive scale, and to gain top-notch experience in cloud computing. You'll be surrounded by people who are smart, passionate about cloud computing, and believe that world class service is critical to customer success. You'll become expert at EC2 platform diagnosis, response, measurement, and automation. You will design and build the operational scalability that sustains the platform's insane growth. You will be able to measure your success by its visible impact on the efficiency and effectiveness of government services for our nation. A day in the lifeAmazon has a fast-paced environment where we "Work Hard, Have Fun, Make History." On a "typical" day engineers might deep dive to root cause a customer issue, investigate why a metric is trending the wrong way, consult with the top engineers at Amazon, or discuss radical new approaches to automate operational issues. About the teamWhy AWSAmazon Web Services (AWS) is the world's most comprehensive and broadly adopted cloud platform. We pioneered cloud computing and never stopped innovating - that's why customers from the most successful startups to Global 500 companies trust our robust suite of products and services to power their businesses. Is Bangaloreâ€™s IT Sector Ready for Trumpâ€™s New Tariff World?Over the past few weeks, Trumpâ€™s re-election bid has reignited his tariff-first doctrineâ€”this time with a clearer structure: green, yellow, red buckets for trade partners. India likely sits in the â€œyellowâ€ zoneâ€”strategic, but not untouchable.While the tariffs are primarily aimed at goods, the ripple effect on the U.S. economy and client behaviors will directly impact Indiaâ€™s $280B IT industryâ€”especially in Bangalore, the tech capital of the world.So letâ€™s talk real numbers and ground realities for Bangaloreâ€™s IT ecosystem:â¸»Short-Term Impact (2024-2025): â€¢	Client Anxiety = Project SlowdownsWith inflationary fears rising in the U.S. due to tariffs, clients are delaying discretionary IT spends.â†’ Project closures are down by 1.3% QoQ.â†’ Bench strength has increased by 15% in Tier 1 IT firms. â€¢	Hiring Freeze LightHiring across software services and product-based companies is down by 22% YoY in Bangalore since Jan 2024. Lateral hiring is particularly slow. â€¢	Revenue Dips in BFSI and RetailU.S.-based clients from banking and retailâ€”major verticals for Indian ITâ€”are cutting back budgets by 8â€“10% as per early FY25 trends.â¸»Long-Term Outlook (2025-2030): â€¢	Opportunity in U.S. Re-shoringAs U.S. firms diversify away from China/Vietnam, India can absorb that businessâ€”if it aligns its manufacturing + IT policy.â†’ Expect up to 3 million new tech-manufacturing crossover jobs by 2030. â€¢	New Skilling DemandsDemand for AI, DevOps, Cybersecurity and Cloud Infra experts will surge. Bangalore must build a new tech workforce, not just more headcount. â€¢	Strategic Green Zone?If India navigates diplomacy well, it could move into the â€œgreen bucketâ€ of U.S. tradeâ€”with tariff relief and investment access.â†’ That could unlock $100B+ in bilateral digital infrastructure flows in the next 5 years.â¸»The Big Picture:Yes, Trumpâ€™s tariff chaos looks messy. â° Mastering CRON Scheduling in Jenkins and CI/CD PipelinesAutomating builds, tests, and deployments efficiently is crucial in modern DevOps workflows. One powerful tool for achieving this is CRON scheduling.In Jenkins (and many other CI/CD tools), CRON lets you define precise schedules for automated tasks using a simple syntax:```* * * * *|  |  |  |  ||  |  |  | +--- Day of the week (0-7) (Sunday=0 or 7)|  |  | +----- Month (1-12)|  | +------- Day of the month (1-31)| +--------- Hour (0-23)+----------- Minute (0-59)```Examples:- Every minute: `* * * * *`- Every day at midnight: `0 0 * * *`- Every Sunday at 3 AM: `0 3 * * 0`Using CRON effectively ensures your CI/CD pipelines run precisely when needed, optimizing resource utilization and keeping your software delivery process smooth and predictable.hashtag#DevOps hashtag#Jenkins hashtag#CICD hashtag#Automation hashtag#CRON hashtag#ContinuousIntegration hashtag#ContinuousDelivery

Navigating the 2025 Job Market: A Challenging Reality for Job Seekers ğŸ’¼ğŸ”The job market in 2025 is more competitive than ever, with tightening hiring processes, automation reshaping industries, and companies focusing on cost-efficiency. For those seeking jobs, this means fewer job postings, evolving skill demands, and an increasing reliance on AI ğŸ¤–. With the U.S. unemployment rate at 4.2% and AI-driven automation affecting 60% of jobs, itâ€™s clear that the struggle is real.Reflecting on my own journey:ğŸ’  I started my job search in August 2024, and it took me almost two weeks just to perfect my resume! Even when I thought I was done, I kept refining it ğŸ“„ğŸ”„.ğŸ’ No one was around to guide me on how to apply for jobs, but Pritesh Jagani 's videos became my lifesaver. I tuned into his several podcasts ğŸ§ to understand how to market myself effectively.ğŸ’ I can't do mass applications. An application almost takes an hour for me, first finding the right job application, then tailoring resume, asking for referral, applying, and then reaching out to recruiters. This way I find that I got better results. It's all about quality over quantity âœ….ğŸ’ Reaching out to over 1000 employees on LinkedIn, I only received responses from 10 to 15 people agreeing to refer ğŸ¤. I've applied to 300+ jobs so far. Received several emails from companies saying that the position has been filled, or has been closed. I gave a few screening rounds, and final rounds too. Every interview resulted in rejection. Disappointing, but every rejection has been a learning experience ğŸ’ª. In parallel, Iâ€™ve been developing my skills, building projects ğŸ› ï¸, and growing my network ğŸŒ. While the road is tough, Iâ€™ve gained valuable insights from this journey. Here are my key takeaways:ğŸ”‘ Just submitting your resume online isnâ€™t enoughâ€”always apply via a referral ğŸ’¡.ğŸ”‘ Reach out to recruiters! Express why youâ€™re a great fit for the role, show your enthusiasm for the company, and demonstrate your research on the organization ğŸ“š.ğŸ”‘ Tap into your alumni network. Finding alumni from your program and requesting a brief virtual chat can unlock hidden job opportunities and expand your connections ğŸ‘¥.With expertise in full-stack development, AI-driven solutions, and cloud technologies, I am proficient in JavaScript, React, Node.js, Express, Python, MongoDB, and DevOps tools such as Jenkins and Docker. ğŸ’»ğŸš€ I am continuously expanding my skill set and am open to new opportunities where I can contribute to innovative projects and further advance my career. ğŸ“ˆ I am currently seeking a position where I can apply my skills and experience. If you have any relevant opportunities, feel free to reach out to meâ€”Iâ€™d be happy to connect and discuss how I can contribute to your team. ğŸ¤hashtag#OpenToWork hashtag#Hiring hashtag#SoftwareEngineer hashtag#FullStackDeveloper hashtag#AI hashtag#JavaScript hashtag#ReactJS hashtag#NodeJS hashtag#Python hashtag#DevOps hashtag#JobSearch hashtag#TechJobs hashtag#SoftwareDevelopment

hashtag#hiring *ADC Engineer II, EC2 with Security Clearance*, Herndon, *United States*, fulltime hashtag#opentowork hashtag#Herndonjobs hashtag#Virginiajobs hashtag#ITCommunications hashtag#entrylevel hashtag#firstjob hashtag#newgrad hashtag#internship hashtag#entryleveljobs *To Apply -->*: https://lnkd.in/g4Fmmq3F DESCRIPTION Would you like to help implement innovative cloud computing solutions and solve the world's most complex technical problems? Do you have a deep passion and desire to engineer and operate the world's largest cloud computing infrastructure to provide a better world for future generations? Amazon Web Services is seeking top industry technical experts to grow our team dedicated to expanding our Elastic Compute Cloud (EC2) to government customers. We are seeking a talented engineer skilled in the art of integration who understands the Agile mindset and DevOps philosophies, yet is not constrained by how "things are usually done" and is willing to decompose and reinvent systems, processes, and tools. We're looking for a technical expert for one of the largest compute services on the planet; if you possess that rare mix of depth in Operations, Networking, and Systems Engineering then we are waiting for your application. This position requires that the candidate selected must currently possess and maintain an active TS/SCI security clearance with polygraph. The position further requires the candidate to opt into a commensurate clearance for each government agency for which they perform AWS work. Key job responsibilitiesYou'll be part of a world-class team in a fast-paced environment that has the entrepreneurial feel of a start-up. This is an opportunity to operate and engineer systems on a massive scale, and to gain top-notch experience in cloud computing. You'll be surrounded by people who are smart, passionate about cloud computing, and believe that world class service is critical to customer success. You'll become expert at EC2 platform diagnosis, response, measurement, and automation. You will design and build the operational scalability that sustains the platform's insane growth. You will be able to measure your success by its visible impact on the efficiency and effectiveness of government services for our nation. A day in the lifeAmazon has a fast-paced environment where we "Work Hard, Have Fun, Make History." On a "typical" day engineers might deep dive to root cause a customer issue, investigate why a metric is trending the wrong way, consult with the top engineers at Amazon, or discuss radical new approaches to automate operational issues. About the teamWhy AWSAmazon Web Services (AWS) is the world's most comprehensive and broadly adopted cloud platform. We pioneered cloud computing and never stopped innovating - that's why customers from the most successful startups to Global 500 companies trust our robust suite of products and services to power their businesses. Is Bangaloreâ€™s IT Sector Ready for Trumpâ€™s New Tariff World?Over the past few weeks, Trumpâ€™s re-election bid has reignited his tariff-first doctrineâ€”this time with a clearer structure: green, yellow, red buckets for trade partners. India likely sits in the â€œyellowâ€ zoneâ€”strategic, but not untouchable.While the tariffs are primarily aimed at goods, the ripple effect on the U.S. economy and client behaviors will directly impact Indiaâ€™s $280B IT industryâ€”especially in Bangalore, the tech capital of the world.So letâ€™s talk real numbers and ground realities for Bangaloreâ€™s IT ecosystem:â¸»Short-Term Impact (2024-2025): â€¢	Client Anxiety = Project SlowdownsWith inflationary fears rising in the U.S. due to tariffs, clients are delaying discretionary IT spends.â†’ Project closures are down by 1.3% QoQ.â†’ Bench strength has increased by 15% in Tier 1 IT firms. â€¢	Hiring Freeze LightHiring across software services and product-based companies is down by 22% YoY in Bangalore since Jan 2024. Lateral hiring is particularly slow. â€¢	Revenue Dips in BFSI and RetailU.S.-based clients from banking and retailâ€”major verticals for Indian ITâ€”are cutting back budgets by 8â€“10% as per early FY25 trends.â¸»Long-Term Outlook (2025-2030): â€¢	Opportunity in U.S. Re-shoringAs U.S. firms diversify away from China/Vietnam, India can absorb that businessâ€”if it aligns its manufacturing + IT policy.â†’ Expect up to 3 million new tech-manufacturing crossover jobs by 2030. â€¢	New Skilling DemandsDemand for AI, DevOps, Cybersecurity and Cloud Infra experts will surge. Bangalore must build a new tech workforce, not just more headcount. â€¢	Strategic Green Zone?If India navigates diplomacy well, it could move into the â€œgreen bucketâ€ of U.S. tradeâ€”with tariff relief and investment access.â†’ That could unlock $100B+ in bilateral digital infrastructure flows in the next 5 years.â¸»The Big Picture:Yes, Trumpâ€™s tariff chaos looks messy. â° Mastering CRON Scheduling in Jenkins and CI/CD PipelinesAutomating builds, tests, and deployments efficiently is crucial in modern DevOps workflows. One powerful tool for achieving this is CRON scheduling.In Jenkins (and many other CI/CD tools), CRON lets you define precise schedules for automated tasks using a simple syntax:```* * * * *|  |  |  |  ||  |  |  | +--- Day of the week (0-7) (Sunday=0 or 7)|  |  | +----- Month (1-12)|  | +------- Day of the month (1-31)| +--------- Hour (0-23)+----------- Minute (0-59)```Examples:- Every minute: `* * * * *`- Every day at midnight: `0 0 * * *`- Every Sunday at 3 AM: `0 3 * * 0`Using CRON effectively ensures your CI/CD pipelines run precisely when needed, optimizing resource utilization and keeping your software delivery process smooth and predictable.hashtag#DevOps hashtag#Jenkins hashtag#CICD hashtag#Automation hashtag#CRON hashtag#ContinuousIntegration hashtag#ContinuousDelivery

hashtag#hiring *ADC Engineer II, EC2 with Security Clearance*, Herndon, *United States*, fulltime hashtag#opentowork hashtag#Herndonjobs hashtag#Virginiajobs hashtag#ITCommunications hashtag#entrylevel hashtag#firstjob hashtag#newgrad hashtag#internship hashtag#entryleveljobs *To Apply -->*: https://lnkd.in/g4Fmmq3F DESCRIPTION Would you like to help implement innovative cloud computing solutions and solve the world's most complex technical problems? Do you have a deep passion and desire to engineer and operate the world's largest cloud computing infrastructure to provide a better world for future generations? Amazon Web Services is seeking top industry technical experts to grow our team dedicated to expanding our Elastic Compute Cloud (EC2) to government customers. We are seeking a talented engineer skilled in the art of integration who understands the Agile mindset and DevOps philosophies, yet is not constrained by how "things are usually done" and is willing to decompose and reinvent systems, processes, and tools. We're looking for a technical expert for one of the largest compute services on the planet; if you possess that rare mix of depth in Operations, Networking, and Systems Engineering then we are waiting for your application. This position requires that the candidate selected must currently possess and maintain an active TS/SCI security clearance with polygraph. The position further requires the candidate to opt into a commensurate clearance for each government agency for which they perform AWS work. Key job responsibilitiesYou'll be part of a world-class team in a fast-paced environment that has the entrepreneurial feel of a start-up. This is an opportunity to operate and engineer systems on a massive scale, and to gain top-notch experience in cloud computing. You'll be surrounded by people who are smart, passionate about cloud computing, and believe that world class service is critical to customer success. You'll become expert at EC2 platform diagnosis, response, measurement, and automation. You will design and build the operational scalability that sustains the platform's insane growth. You will be able to measure your success by its visible impact on the efficiency and effectiveness of government services for our nation. A day in the lifeAmazon has a fast-paced environment where we "Work Hard, Have Fun, Make History." On a "typical" day engineers might deep dive to root cause a customer issue, investigate why a metric is trending the wrong way, consult with the top engineers at Amazon, or discuss radical new approaches to automate operational issues. About the teamWhy AWSAmazon Web Services (AWS) is the world's most comprehensive and broadly adopted cloud platform. We pioneered cloud computing and never stopped innovating - that's why customers from the most successful startups to Global 500 companies trust our robust suite of products and services to power their businesses. â° Mastering CRON Scheduling in Jenkins and CI/CD PipelinesAutomating builds, tests, and deployments efficiently is crucial in modern DevOps workflows. One powerful tool for achieving this is CRON scheduling.In Jenkins (and many other CI/CD tools), CRON lets you define precise schedules for automated tasks using a simple syntax:```* * * * *|  |  |  |  ||  |  |  | +--- Day of the week (0-7) (Sunday=0 or 7)|  |  | +----- Month (1-12)|  | +------- Day of the month (1-31)| +--------- Hour (0-23)+----------- Minute (0-59)```Examples:- Every minute: `* * * * *`- Every day at midnight: `0 0 * * *`- Every Sunday at 3 AM: `0 3 * * 0`Using CRON effectively ensures your CI/CD pipelines run precisely when needed, optimizing resource utilization and keeping your software delivery process smooth and predictable.hashtag#DevOps hashtag#Jenkins hashtag#CICD hashtag#Automation hashtag#CRON hashtag#ContinuousIntegration hashtag#ContinuousDelivery

"Engineer | C | C++ | Java | Python | JavaScript | React | AWS | AI | ML | Blockchain | Web3 | DevOps | Cybersecurity | Game Dev | IoT | Cloud"Bro, are you a software engineer or the entire tech industry? ğŸ˜‚Fix: Focus on 3-4 relevant skills, not every buzzword in existence.ğŸ”´ 2. Navigating the 2025 Job Market: A Challenging Reality for Job Seekers ğŸ’¼ğŸ”The job market in 2025 is more competitive than ever, with tightening hiring processes, automation reshaping industries, and companies focusing on cost-efficiency. For those seeking jobs, this means fewer job postings, evolving skill demands, and an increasing reliance on AI ğŸ¤–. With the U.S. unemployment rate at 4.2% and AI-driven automation affecting 60% of jobs, itâ€™s clear that the struggle is real.Reflecting on my own journey:ğŸ’  I started my job search in August 2024, and it took me almost two weeks just to perfect my resume! Even when I thought I was done, I kept refining it ğŸ“„ğŸ”„.ğŸ’ No one was around to guide me on how to apply for jobs, but Pritesh Jagani 's videos became my lifesaver. I tuned into his several podcasts ğŸ§ to understand how to market myself effectively.ğŸ’ I can't do mass applications. An application almost takes an hour for me, first finding the right job application, then tailoring resume, asking for referral, applying, and then reaching out to recruiters. This way I find that I got better results. It's all about quality over quantity âœ….ğŸ’ Reaching out to over 1000 employees on LinkedIn, I only received responses from 10 to 15 people agreeing to refer ğŸ¤. I've applied to 300+ jobs so far. Received several emails from companies saying that the position has been filled, or has been closed. I gave a few screening rounds, and final rounds too. Every interview resulted in rejection. Disappointing, but every rejection has been a learning experience ğŸ’ª. In parallel, Iâ€™ve been developing my skills, building projects ğŸ› ï¸, and growing my network ğŸŒ. While the road is tough, Iâ€™ve gained valuable insights from this journey. Here are my key takeaways:ğŸ”‘ Just submitting your resume online isnâ€™t enoughâ€”always apply via a referral ğŸ’¡.ğŸ”‘ Reach out to recruiters! Express why youâ€™re a great fit for the role, show your enthusiasm for the company, and demonstrate your research on the organization ğŸ“š.ğŸ”‘ Tap into your alumni network. Finding alumni from your program and requesting a brief virtual chat can unlock hidden job opportunities and expand your connections ğŸ‘¥.With expertise in full-stack development, AI-driven solutions, and cloud technologies, I am proficient in JavaScript, React, Node.js, Express, Python, MongoDB, and DevOps tools such as Jenkins and Docker. ğŸ’»ğŸš€ I am continuously expanding my skill set and am open to new opportunities where I can contribute to innovative projects and further advance my career. ğŸ“ˆ I am currently seeking a position where I can apply my skills and experience. If you have any relevant opportunities, feel free to reach out to meâ€”Iâ€™d be happy to connect and discuss how I can contribute to your team. ğŸ¤hashtag#OpenToWork hashtag#Hiring hashtag#SoftwareEngineer hashtag#FullStackDeveloper hashtag#AI hashtag#JavaScript hashtag#ReactJS hashtag#NodeJS hashtag#Python hashtag#DevOps hashtag#JobSearch hashtag#TechJobs hashtag#SoftwareDevelopment

hashtag#hiring *ADC Engineer II, EC2 with Security Clearance*, Herndon, *United States*, fulltime hashtag#opentowork hashtag#Herndonjobs hashtag#Virginiajobs hashtag#ITCommunications hashtag#entrylevel hashtag#firstjob hashtag#newgrad hashtag#internship hashtag#entryleveljobs *To Apply -->*: https://lnkd.in/g4Fmmq3F DESCRIPTION Would you like to help implement innovative cloud computing solutions and solve the world's most complex technical problems? Do you have a deep passion and desire to engineer and operate the world's largest cloud computing infrastructure to provide a better world for future generations? Amazon Web Services is seeking top industry technical experts to grow our team dedicated to expanding our Elastic Compute Cloud (EC2) to government customers. We are seeking a talented engineer skilled in the art of integration who understands the Agile mindset and DevOps philosophies, yet is not constrained by how "things are usually done" and is willing to decompose and reinvent systems, processes, and tools. We're looking for a technical expert for one of the largest compute services on the planet; if you possess that rare mix of depth in Operations, Networking, and Systems Engineering then we are waiting for your application. This position requires that the candidate selected must currently possess and maintain an active TS/SCI security clearance with polygraph. The position further requires the candidate to opt into a commensurate clearance for each government agency for which they perform AWS work. Key job responsibilitiesYou'll be part of a world-class team in a fast-paced environment that has the entrepreneurial feel of a start-up. This is an opportunity to operate and engineer systems on a massive scale, and to gain top-notch experience in cloud computing. You'll be surrounded by people who are smart, passionate about cloud computing, and believe that world class service is critical to customer success. You'll become expert at EC2 platform diagnosis, response, measurement, and automation. You will design and build the operational scalability that sustains the platform's insane growth. You will be able to measure your success by its visible impact on the efficiency and effectiveness of government services for our nation. A day in the lifeAmazon has a fast-paced environment where we "Work Hard, Have Fun, Make History." On a "typical" day engineers might deep dive to root cause a customer issue, investigate why a metric is trending the wrong way, consult with the top engineers at Amazon, or discuss radical new approaches to automate operational issues. About the teamWhy AWSAmazon Web Services (AWS) is the world's most comprehensive and broadly adopted cloud platform. We pioneered cloud computing and never stopped innovating - that's why customers from the most successful startups to Global 500 companies trust our robust suite of products and services to power their businesses. â° Mastering CRON Scheduling in Jenkins and CI/CD PipelinesAutomating builds, tests, and deployments efficiently is crucial in modern DevOps workflows. One powerful tool for achieving this is CRON scheduling.In Jenkins (and many other CI/CD tools), CRON lets you define precise schedules for automated tasks using a simple syntax:```* * * * *|  |  |  |  ||  |  |  | +--- Day of the week (0-7) (Sunday=0 or 7)|  |  | +----- Month (1-12)|  | +------- Day of the month (1-31)| +--------- Hour (0-23)+----------- Minute (0-59)```Examples:- Every minute: `* * * * *`- Every day at midnight: `0 0 * * *`- Every Sunday at 3 AM: `0 3 * * 0`Using CRON effectively ensures your CI/CD pipelines run precisely when needed, optimizing resource utilization and keeping your software delivery process smooth and predictable.hashtag#DevOps hashtag#Jenkins hashtag#CICD hashtag#Automation hashtag#CRON hashtag#ContinuousIntegration hashtag#ContinuousDelivery

Navigating the 2025 Job Market: A Challenging Reality for Job Seekers ğŸ’¼ğŸ”The job market in 2025 is more competitive than ever, with tightening hiring processes, automation reshaping industries, and companies focusing on cost-efficiency. For those seeking jobs, this means fewer job postings, evolving skill demands, and an increasing reliance on AI ğŸ¤–. With the U.S. unemployment rate at 4.2% and AI-driven automation affecting 60% of jobs, itâ€™s clear that the struggle is real.Reflecting on my own journey:ğŸ’  I started my job search in August 2024, and it took me almost two weeks just to perfect my resume! Even when I thought I was done, I kept refining it ğŸ“„ğŸ”„.ğŸ’ No one was around to guide me on how to apply for jobs, but Pritesh Jagani 's videos became my lifesaver. I tuned into his several podcasts ğŸ§ to understand how to market myself effectively.ğŸ’ I can't do mass applications. An application almost takes an hour for me, first finding the right job application, then tailoring resume, asking for referral, applying, and then reaching out to recruiters. This way I find that I got better results. It's all about quality over quantity âœ….ğŸ’ Reaching out to over 1000 employees on LinkedIn, I only received responses from 10 to 15 people agreeing to refer ğŸ¤. I've applied to 300+ jobs so far. Received several emails from companies saying that the position has been filled, or has been closed. I gave a few screening rounds, and final rounds too. Every interview resulted in rejection. Disappointing, but every rejection has been a learning experience ğŸ’ª. In parallel, Iâ€™ve been developing my skills, building projects ğŸ› ï¸, and growing my network ğŸŒ. While the road is tough, Iâ€™ve gained valuable insights from this journey. Here are my key takeaways:ğŸ”‘ Just submitting your resume online isnâ€™t enoughâ€”always apply via a referral ğŸ’¡.ğŸ”‘ Reach out to recruiters! Express why youâ€™re a great fit for the role, show your enthusiasm for the company, and demonstrate your research on the organization ğŸ“š.ğŸ”‘ Tap into your alumni network. Finding alumni from your program and requesting a brief virtual chat can unlock hidden job opportunities and expand your connections ğŸ‘¥.With expertise in full-stack development, AI-driven solutions, and cloud technologies, I am proficient in JavaScript, React, Node.js, Express, Python, MongoDB, and DevOps tools such as Jenkins and Docker. ğŸ’»ğŸš€ I am continuously expanding my skill set and am open to new opportunities where I can contribute to innovative projects and further advance my career. ğŸ“ˆ I am currently seeking a position where I can apply my skills and experience. If you have any relevant opportunities, feel free to reach out to meâ€”Iâ€™d be happy to connect and discuss how I can contribute to your team. ğŸ¤hashtag#OpenToWork hashtag#Hiring hashtag#SoftwareEngineer hashtag#FullStackDeveloper hashtag#AI hashtag#JavaScript hashtag#ReactJS hashtag#NodeJS hashtag#Python hashtag#DevOps hashtag#JobSearch hashtag#TechJobs hashtag#SoftwareDevelopment

hashtag#hiring *ADC Engineer II, EC2 with Security Clearance*, Herndon, *United States*, fulltime hashtag#opentowork hashtag#Herndonjobs hashtag#Virginiajobs hashtag#ITCommunications hashtag#entrylevel hashtag#firstjob hashtag#newgrad hashtag#internship hashtag#entryleveljobs *To Apply -->*: https://lnkd.in/g4Fmmq3F DESCRIPTION Would you like to help implement innovative cloud computing solutions and solve the world's most complex technical problems? Do you have a deep passion and desire to engineer and operate the world's largest cloud computing infrastructure to provide a better world for future generations? Amazon Web Services is seeking top industry technical experts to grow our team dedicated to expanding our Elastic Compute Cloud (EC2) to government customers. We are seeking a talented engineer skilled in the art of integration who understands the Agile mindset and DevOps philosophies, yet is not constrained by how "things are usually done" and is willing to decompose and reinvent systems, processes, and tools. We're looking for a technical expert for one of the largest compute services on the planet; if you possess that rare mix of depth in Operations, Networking, and Systems Engineering then we are waiting for your application. This position requires that the candidate selected must currently possess and maintain an active TS/SCI security clearance with polygraph. The position further requires the candidate to opt into a commensurate clearance for each government agency for which they perform AWS work. Key job responsibilitiesYou'll be part of a world-class team in a fast-paced environment that has the entrepreneurial feel of a start-up. This is an opportunity to operate and engineer systems on a massive scale, and to gain top-notch experience in cloud computing. You'll be surrounded by people who are smart, passionate about cloud computing, and believe that world class service is critical to customer success. You'll become expert at EC2 platform diagnosis, response, measurement, and automation. You will design and build the operational scalability that sustains the platform's insane growth. You will be able to measure your success by its visible impact on the efficiency and effectiveness of government services for our nation. A day in the lifeAmazon has a fast-paced environment where we "Work Hard, Have Fun, Make History." On a "typical" day engineers might deep dive to root cause a customer issue, investigate why a metric is trending the wrong way, consult with the top engineers at Amazon, or discuss radical new approaches to automate operational issues. About the teamWhy AWSAmazon Web Services (AWS) is the world's most comprehensive and broadly adopted cloud platform. We pioneered cloud computing and never stopped innovating - that's why customers from the most successful startups to Global 500 companies trust our robust suite of products and services to power their businesses. Is Bangaloreâ€™s IT Sector Ready for Trumpâ€™s New Tariff World?Over the past few weeks, Trumpâ€™s re-election bid has reignited his tariff-first doctrineâ€”this time with a clearer structure: green, yellow, red buckets for trade partners. India likely sits in the â€œyellowâ€ zoneâ€”strategic, but not untouchable.While the tariffs are primarily aimed at goods, the ripple effect on the U.S. economy and client behaviors will directly impact Indiaâ€™s $280B IT industryâ€”especially in Bangalore, the tech capital of the world.So letâ€™s talk real numbers and ground realities for Bangaloreâ€™s IT ecosystem:â¸»Short-Term Impact (2024-2025): â€¢	Client Anxiety = Project SlowdownsWith inflationary fears rising in the U.S. due to tariffs, clients are delaying discretionary IT spends.â†’ Project closures are down by 1.3% QoQ.â†’ Bench strength has increased by 15% in Tier 1 IT firms. â€¢	Hiring Freeze LightHiring across software services and product-based companies is down by 22% YoY in Bangalore since Jan 2024. Lateral hiring is particularly slow. â€¢	Revenue Dips in BFSI and RetailU.S.-based clients from banking and retailâ€”major verticals for Indian ITâ€”are cutting back budgets by 8â€“10% as per early FY25 trends.â¸»Long-Term Outlook (2025-2030): â€¢	Opportunity in U.S. Re-shoringAs U.S. firms diversify away from China/Vietnam, India can absorb that businessâ€”if it aligns its manufacturing + IT policy.â†’ Expect up to 3 million new tech-manufacturing crossover jobs by 2030. â€¢	New Skilling DemandsDemand for AI, DevOps, Cybersecurity and Cloud Infra experts will surge. Bangalore must build a new tech workforce, not just more headcount. â€¢	Strategic Green Zone?If India navigates diplomacy well, it could move into the â€œgreen bucketâ€ of U.S. tradeâ€”with tariff relief and investment access.â†’ That could unlock $100B+ in bilateral digital infrastructure flows in the next 5 years.â¸»The Big Picture:Yes, Trumpâ€™s tariff chaos looks messy.
